title: The Villa Albani. Veduta della Villa dell' Emo Sigr. Card. Alessandro Albani fuori di Porta Salaria (View of the Villa of Cardinal Alessandro Albani)
provenance_text:
M. Knoedler & Co., New York, NY; sold to Kenneth Seaver, Pittsburgh, PA on April 1, 1927 until December 8, 1948 [1]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1948.

Notes:
[1] Purchased for $30; see original invoice dated April 1, 1927 (for purchases made on February 26, 1927) in curatorial file.
